summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 63rd Avenue Southwest from Alki Avenue on the north to Alki Avenue on the south; and Alki Avenue, from 63rd Avenue Southwest to Sea Shore Park Addition, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same and providing for the necessary surface drainage, all in accordance with Resolution No. 2855 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
